commandUpload.title: Upload script to Tasmota
commandNewScript.title: Create new Tasmota script
tasmota-script-support.uploadTimeout: Specifies the upload timeout (in milliseconds) used during script uploads.
tasmota-script-support.scriptSizeStatusB: Refresh timeout for status bar indicator (in milliseconds). Is the time the editor waits from your last typing to update the stripped size of your script.
tasmota-script-support.customTemplatePat: Is the path to a custom template to be used by the 'Create new Tasmota script' command.
